src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uzakuthi ungatlikitlelwa ukuba mthetho, umsebenzi othunywe ukwenziwa yi-PSC udluliselwe nakibomasipala neenjamisweni zombuso.
tgt_text: Imitsetfosivivinyo.

src_text: Ukutjhugululwa komthetho lo kuzakwenza i-PSC iqalane ngcono nokwenza umsebenzi wokutjheja kuhle nokusikimela phezulu, nokwenza izinto ngemikghwa nemithetho emihle ekhuthazela ubuhle bemisebenzi yombuso.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Loluhlaka Wekuchibela Telihhovisi Lemcondzisi Lotimele Wekuphenya Temaphoyisa (i-IPID) wanga-2023.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uyatholakala kubunzinzolwazi WEBTOKEN..Umtlamo Womthethomlingwa Wee-2023 Wokutjhugulula Umthetho Olawula I-Nuclear IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende komtlamo womThethomlingwa wokutjhugulula umThetho oLawula i-Nuclear.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile Umtsetfosivivinyo Loluhlaka Wekuchibela te-IPID wanga-2023 kutsi ungeniswe ePhalamende.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhugulula umThetho oLawula i-Nuclear (i-NNR), we-1999 (umThetho 47 we-1999).
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uchibela Umtsetfo we-IPID, wanga-2011 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 1 wanga-2011), futsi wenta tiphakamiso lokuhloswe ngato kufaka kutimela kwekusebenta nekwesikhungo se-IPID, kunika emandla “kusehlulelo sa-McBride”.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo unqophe ukukhibelela itlhayelo ekhona njenganje emThethweni we-NNR we-1999.
tgt_text: Letichibelo tiphindze futsi tilungise tingcinamba letiphakanyiswe Inkantolo Yemtsetfosisekelo lememetele kutsi atikho emtsetfweni letinye timiso teMtsetfo wanga-2011 we-IPID, letagunyata Indvuna Yetemaphoyisa kutsi imise emsebentini Umcondzisi Wesigungu Lesiphetse, kutsatsa tinyatselo tekumcondzisa tigwegwe Umcondzisi Wesigungu Lesiphetse ngemuva kwekumiswa, kanye nekususwa ehhovisi Umcondzisi Wesigungu Lesiphetse.

src_text: Ngalendlela ongayo njenganje umThetho lo, awukhambisani nekambiso ehle yamazwe ngamazwe osetjenziselwa ukuphepha kwe-nuclear ngoba awunasisombululo semiraro abantu abasebenza nge-nuclear abaqalana nayo ngengozi yomtjhiso wemisebe yomhlaba.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uphakamisa kutsi kube nenchubo levulekile nalengafihli lutfo yekukhetfwa kweMcondzisi Wesigungu Lesiphetse kanye nenchubo lenemininingwane yekuhlola bucotfo betiphatsimandla te-IPILoMtsetfosivivinyo uphindze futsi uchubeke wente kutsi kube nekuchitjelwa kwaletinye timiso teMtsetfo Lomkhulu, ngenhloso yekucinisekisa kutsi i-IPID yenta ligunyakwenta layo ngemphumelelo futsi nangelikhono.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo godu wenzelelwe ukuthomanisa umThetho we-NNR yomNyaka we-1999 nemithetholawulo nekambiso yemikghwa emihle ye-International Atomic Energy Agency, (i-IAEA).

src_text: Ukugcotjwa KwakaMengameli We-Federali Riphabhligi Ye-Nigeria
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo unika emandla kutincomo tePhaneli yaMengameli letimayelana ne-Ejensi Yembuso Yetekuvikeleka (i-SSA) kanye nekufezekisa kwelisu letincomo teKhomishini Yetebulungiswa Lephenya Ngetinsolo Tekubanjwa Kwembuso Ngabhongwane, Inkhohlakalo neNkhohliso kuMkakha Wahulumende lokufaka ekhatsi Tinhlaka Tembuso.

src_text: NgoMvulo womhla wama-29 kuMrhayili wee-2023, uMengameli Ramaphosa uzokuya emnyanyeni amenywe kiwo wokugcotjwa kwaloyo okhethelwe ukuba nguMengameli, uNom.
tgt_text: Emkhatsini walokunye, loMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose:

src_text: Bola Ahmed Tinubu we-Federali Riphabhligi ye-Nigeria.
tgt_text: kwakha kabusha imisebenti yetebunhloli kwenta kutsi kube nesakhiwo sesikhungo lesitawusebenta ngemphumelelo nangelikhono ngekutsi sisungule i-ejensi yetebunhloli yasekhaya kanye neyemisebenti yetebunhloli yemave angephandle

src_text: Ukuhlanganyela kwakaMengameli wekhethu nabanye ekugcotjweni kwakaMengameli we-Nigeria kuzakuba sitjengiso sokuraga kobudlelwano bokusebenzisana ngezobuzenda hlangana kweSewula Afrika ne-Nigeria.
tgt_text: kulungisa emaphutsa ekusebenteni kweMandla Etimphawu teTebunhloli njengaloku kucinisekiswe Inkantolo yeMtsetfosisekelo

src_text: I-Nigeria imrhwebelani weSewula Afrika omkhulu esiphandeni seTjingalanga ye-Afrika.
tgt_text: kulungisa butsakatsaka lobubonwe yi-Financial Action Task Force, lokufaka ekhatsi tinyatselo tekulwa nekukhwabanisa imali nekusita ngetimali buphekulasikhuni ngekutsi kutfutfukiswe takhiwo tavelonkhe tekuvikeleka kutsi tikhone kuphenya nekwenta luhlolo lwetekuvikela nangabe umuntu nome sikhungo sifaka kuvikeleka kwavelonkhe

src_text: Manengi amafemu wemihlobohlobo asebenzela e-Nigeria, ukube ngahlanye namafemu we-Nigeria nawo athoma ukunzinza eSewula Afrika..IVeke YokuVikelwa KwabaNtwana ISewula Afrika izokutjheja iVeke YokuVikelwa KwabaNtwana ukusukela ngomhla wama-28 kuMrhayili ukuyokufika kumhla wesi-04 kuMgwengweni wee-2023, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Asivikele Abantwana Ngesikhathi se-COVID-19 Nangemva Kwayo.” Ijimeli likhwezelela woke amakoro nomphakathi ukuthi ukhuthalele ukwakha nokuthuthukisa, nokutjheja kunye nokuvikela abantwana.
tgt_text: kucinisa tinyatselo tekulawula nekuchumanisa imboni yetekuvikela letimele njengencenye lebanti yendlela yavelonkhe yekuvikela kanye

src_text: Ijima lanonyaka lizokuqalana ne-RISHA, elihlelo lomphakathi lokuvikela nokuthatha amagadango msinyana, elinqophe ukuphephisa abantwana ekucatjhazweni, babe nekghono lokujamelana nemihlobohlobo yobujamo bezinto..Ivakatjho Lokuhlola Isibonelo Sezetuthuko (i-DDM) SePumalanga Kapa ISekela likaMengameli uNom.
tgt_text: nekwenta kutsi kube netinyatselo tekulawula indlela yekutiphatsa kwemalunga aphambilini alesikhungo setebunhloli kanye nalabanye labafinyelela kutfola lwatiso lwetebunhloli.

src_text: Paul Mashatile ngomhla wama-26 nowama-27 kuMrhayili wee-2023 uzokuya e-OR Tambo District ne-Buffalo City Metro ePumalanga Kapa ngevakatjho lokuyokuhlola ukusebenza kwe-DDIvakatjhweli liyingcenye yomzamo karhulumende wokuqinisekisa ukuthi ukuthuthukiswa kweendawo zabantu kwenzeka ngendlela elungelelekileko, esekelwa yikambiso ye-DDM..Ihlandla Lesithandathu LePalamende Ye-Afrika (i-PAP|) Abarholi abavela eendaweni ngeendawo zelizwekazi le-Afrika bahlangene ukusukela ngoMvulo womhla we-15 kuMrhayili e-Midrand, eSewula Afrika, bahlanganela ihlandla lesiThandathu lePalamende ye-Afrika (i-PAP).
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo utawuchubeka futsi ucinisekise kutsi imisebenti ye-SSA ayisetjentiswa ngalokungafanele kufezekisa timfuno nome tinhlelo tebantfu labatsite.

src_text: Umhlangano wePalamende lo uzokuphela ngomhla we-02 kuMgwengweni wee-2023.
tgt_text: Letichibelo titawucinisa kwenganyelwa kwemsebenti wema-ejensi etebunhloli lokutawukwentiwa yimitimba lefanana neMhloli Jikelele Wetebunhloli, Likomidi Lelihlanganisa Tindlu Totimbili Letebunhloli kanye neMhlolimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: I-PAP inqophe ukulungisa iintjhijilo ezifanako elizwekazini le-Afrika, kanti-ke ijanyelwe barholi be-Afrika abavela kilo loke ilizwekazeli..Ikomitjhini Eyihlanganisela Yaborhulumende Ngezesayensi Yelwandle (i-IOC) ISewula Afrika izokuhlanganyela namanye amazwe emhlanganweni wama-56 womkhandlu ophetheko ozokubanjelwa e-Paris, e-France, ukusukela ngomhla we-16 ukuyokufika kumhla wama-30 kuMgwengweni wee-2023.
tgt_text: Lomtsetfosivivinyo utfolakala ku: WEBTOKEN..Umtsetfosivivinyo Loluhlaka weKhomishini Yetemisebenti Yahulumende (i-PSC) wanga-2023 Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo loluhlaka we-PSC wanga-2023 kute kutsi ummango uphawule.

src_text: I-IOC yeHlangano yezeFundo, zeSayensi nezamaSiko (i-IOC-UNESCO) ngaphasi kwe-UN isijamiso se-UN ephethe umsebenzi wokusekela imisebenzi yesayensi yelwandle ephasini loke.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo ucitsa Umtsetfo we-PSC, wanga-1997 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 46 wanga-1997) weMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996.

src_text: ISewula Afrika iyakulimuka ukuqakatheka kwerhubhululo nokulawulwa kwamalwandle wayo neendawo zeligu lamalwandle, nakuzakuba netuthuko ebambelelako.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo wenta kutsi kube nekusungulwa kwamabhalane lotimele we-PSC kute kuciniswe kutimela nekungakhetsi kwalenhlangano.

src_text: Irhubhululo lesayensi yelwandle libuye lisize nangokuyelelisa kusese nesikhathi nakuza ihlekelele yelwandle, lisiza naborhulumende ukuthi bathathe iinqunto ngokulandela amaphuzu welwazi..ISewula Afrika Isingatha Imidlalo Emikhulu Yamaphaliswano Weenkutani Abalandeli bemidlalo ephasini loke bangalindela ukwamukelwa ngommoya woBuntu omuhle nokuphathwa ngezandla ezifuthumeleko ngokwezinga lamazwe ngamazwe lokhuya nabeza emiDlalweni yeBhigiri yePhasi yeenKutani ze-Netball neye-Kimura Shukokai International (i-KSI) Karate World Championship ezokudlalelwa eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Nangabe loMtsetfosivivinyo sewuphasisiwe waba ngumtsetfo, ligunyakwenta le-PSC litawufinyelela nakubomasipala nasetikhungweni temmango.

src_text: ISewula Afrika inomlando omuhle wokusingatha imibuthano yemidlalo emikhulu.
tgt_text: Lesichibelo sitawunika i-PSC indlelakwenta yekugcila kakhulu ekufakeni ligalelo lelivakalako ekwakheni temisebenti yahulumende tibe nguletiphendvulako, letenta tintfo ngenchubo lemukelekile futsi letichuntjwa ngemazingagugu.

src_text: Solo kuya ngokuphakama ukuthakasa njengoba sekusele isikhathi esingaphezudlwana kwama-60 wamalanga ukuthi kuthome imiDlalo yePhaliswano leBhigiri yePhasi ye-Netball eKapa ukusukela ngomhla wama-28 kuVelabahlinze ukuyokufika kumhla we-06 kuRhoboyi wee-2023.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uyatfolakala ku: WEBTOKEN.

src_text: Kungekokuthoma ukuthi iphaliswano lalemidlalo ekara amehlo woke lizokudlalelwa ehlabathini ye-Afrika.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Loluhlaka Wekuchibela Temlawuli Wavelonkhe Wetenuzi wanga-2023.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela woke umuntu ukuthi asekele ijima le-Netball Fridays ngokwembatha izambatho zabasekeli namkha ngokuhlobisa ngemibala yelizwe, kusekelwa isiqhema se-Netball seSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile Umtsetfosivivinyo Loluhlaka Wekuchibela Temlawuli Wavelonkhe Wetenuzi kutsi ungeniswe ePhalamende.

src_text: I-KSI South Afrika godu izokusingatha ihlandla lama-20 lemidlalo yekaradi i-KSI Karate World Championship eKapa ukusukela ngomhla we-10 ukuyokufika kumhla we-15 kuVelabahlinze wee-2023, kanti iimfiselabuhle zethu sizithumela esiQhemeni seSewula Afrika (i-Team SA) njengoba sizilungiselela lombuthano wemidlalo erhanyazelako yephasiloke nje.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uchibela Umtsetfo Wemlawuli Wavelonkhe Wetenuzi (i-NNR), wanga-1999 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 47 wanga-1999).

src_text: ISewula Afrika isingethe ngokuzikhakhazisa iPhaliswani lamaFayinali leenKutani leBholo ePhayelwa eTafuleni elidlalelwa e-Durban Internationl Convention Centre njenganje.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kulungisa tikhebe letikhona kuloMtsetfo we-NNR wanga-1999 lokhona.

src_text: Balinganiselwa ema-600 abadlali abavela emazweni ngamazwe wephasi loke abezwana amandla njenganje kilemidlalo, kanti-ke lemidlalo inikela abadlali bekhethu ithuba lokuveza ithalentha labo.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfo kulesimo lokuso kwanyalo awuhambisani nekwenta lokuncono kakhulu kwemave emhlaba emkhakheni wemitsetfosimiso wetekuphepha kwetenuzi ngobe awulungisi kuvuleleka kunuzi nawusemsebentini kwemalunga lasebenta endizeni.

src_text: Imidlalo le ithome ngomhla wama-20 kuMrhayili wee-2023, kanti-ke izabe iyokuphela ngomhla wama-28 kuye uMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uphindze wabhaleka ngendlela yekutsi uhambisane neMtsetfo we-NNR wanga-1999 nemitsetfosimiso ye-Ejensi Yemave Emhlaba Yetemandla Ete-Athomi (i-IAEA) kanye netindlela tekwenta letincono kakhulu.

src_text: Imilayezo.

src_text: Cholera outbreak Management
tgt_text: Cholera outbreak Management

src_text: Cabinet welcomed President Cyril Ramaphosa’s planned visit to and interaction with residents of Hammanskraal.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed President Cyril Ramaphosa’s planned visit to and interaction with residents of Hammanskraal.

src_text: The visit did take place today, Thursday, 08 June, 2023, and this engagement gave the President the opportunity to hear directly from residents about the challenges they face.
tgt_text: The visit did take place today, Thursday, 08 June, 2023, and this engagement gave the President the opportunity to hear directly from residents about the challenges they face.

src_text: The President, the Minister of Water and Sanitation and the Executive Mayor of Tshwane were able to assess government interventions in the area and provide relevant feedback to residents.
tgt_text: The President, the Minister of Water and Sanitation and the Executive Mayor of Tshwane were able to assess government interventions in the area and provide relevant feedback to residents.

src_text: Government interventions include the field hospital operational in Kanana, Hammanskraal, and a multi-disciplinary team of experts to arrest the spread which has successfully treated hundreds of people.
tgt_text: Government interventions include the field hospital operational in Kanana, Hammanskraal, and a multi-disciplinary team of experts to arrest the spread which has successfully treated hundreds of people.

src_text: Work is also underway to ensure that local councils use their water infrastructure grants effectively.
tgt_text: Work is also underway to ensure that local councils use their water infrastructure grants effectively.

src_text: For the current financial year, over R14 billion has been set aside for municipalities to address water infrastructure backlogs.
tgt_text: For the current financial year, over R14 billion has been set aside for municipalities to address water infrastructure backlogs.

src_text: Cabinet welcomes the cooperation between the City of Tshwane and Department of Water and Sanitation on the planned upgrade of the Rooiwal Water Treatment plant, which will be undertaken over three phases at a cost of R4 billion.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomes the cooperation between the City of Tshwane and Department of Water and Sanitation on the planned upgrade of the Rooiwal Water Treatment plant, which will be undertaken over three phases at a cost of R4 billion.

src_text: Cabinet calls on the affected communities to remain vigilant and to take special care of children.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on the affected communities to remain vigilant and to take special care of children.

src_text: Cholera can be prevented by using safe water.
tgt_text: Cholera can be prevented by using safe water.

src_text: Treat the water first by boiling it for at least 1 minute and always wash your hands with clean water and soap.
tgt_text: Treat the water first by boiling it for at least 1 minute and always wash your hands with clean water and soap.

src_text: For more information on prevention tips WEBTOKEN Government thanks those volunteer organisations and individuals who have stepped forward to lend a hand.

src_text: Cabinet approved the introduction of the draft National Small Enterprise Amendment Bill to Parliament.

src_text: The draft Bill aims to amend the National Small Enterprise Act (Act 102 of 1996) and provides for the establishment and registration of the Office of Small Enterprise Ombud Service.
tgt_text: The draft Bill aims to amend the National Small Enterprise Act (Act 102 of 1996) and provides for the establishment and registration of the Office of Small Enterprise Ombud Service.

src_text: It broadens fair processes for small enterprises through the Ombud Service, which will be tasked with considering and disposing of complaints by small enterprises.
tgt_text: It broadens fair processes for small enterprises through the Ombud Service, which will be tasked with considering and disposing of complaints by small enterprises.

src_text: Implementation of the amendments will realise greater stability to the sector and advance economic opportunity through the creation of job opportunities by small, medium and micro enterprises.
